function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in demand for larger homes and outdoor spaces may lead to overcrowding and reduced physical distancing, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease spread and potential outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implement zoning regulations and building codes that prioritize adequate spacing and ventilation, and promote the use of technology for virtual communication and remote work.","Technologies":"Zoning management software, virtual meeting platforms, remote work tools.","People":"Residents, real estate developers, local governments.","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, real estate developers."},{"Description":"Decline in demand for affordable housing may lead to displacement and overcrowding in lower-income communities, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease spread in crowded and underserved areas.","Mitigation":"Invest in affordable housing initiatives, provide financial incentives for mixed-income developments, and enforce housing equality regulations.","Technologies":"Affordable housing financing tools, urban planning software, monitoring and enforcement systems.","People":"Low-income residents, local communities, urban planners.","Owner":"Government housing agencies, local governments, real estate developers."}]}
